Pre-reqs: CRWR 203.
The Lecture portion of this course is web-based and does not have a scheduled time. Students must also register for a workshop (CRWR 303- LS1 or LS2.)
Restriction: This course is open to all students EXCEPT CRWR Majors.

courseName: Intermediate Writing for Children and Young Adults
description: The writing of work for children and young adults in various forms using a combination of workshopping and online modules. Manuscript submission not required for admission.
